SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents the player character in the game.

The Player this class represents the player character's attributes and behaviours, such as visual representation, velocity, jumping abilities, and position.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int x, int y, int width, int height, String imagePath)
      The Player class constructs a new Player with the given parameters - x, y, width, height and imagePath.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial X coordinate of the player
      y - the initial Y coordinate of the player
      width - the width of the player
      height - the height of the player
      imagePath - the file path to the player's image

      public void setCanJump(boolean canJump)
      Sets the player's ability to jump.
      Parameters:
